section 1.head: My recent projects
section 1.copy: Recently my work has involved; user experience, web design, app design and  illustration. My projects have spanned across small and large clients and budgets and have required diverse knowledge and skills to complete. You can view projects as a whole by clicking a tile below or alternatively you can view individual skills in the next section.

section 2.head: What do I do?
section 2.copy: I prefer to take a top down view when working on projects so I see nurturing a diverse skillset as paramount to my craft. Doing so enables me to work with a multitude of professionals, take multiple perspectives, form a more rounded understanding of problems and help to identify possible solutions.</br></br>One skill that I don't address in this section is my ability to write front end code. The reason for excluding this is because at present I use this to form better working relationships with developers when designing. A developers workload can be drastically reduced by tackling problems in design and by providing them with concrete files.</br></br>This site is designed and coded by myself.

section 3.head: who is this charming fellow?
section 3.copy: I am a digital interactive designer with 3 years experience working on user experience, web design, online advertising and illustration projects. I have worked with a range of clients from global advertising agencies to small London based startups.</br></br>I currently live in East London and am able to work remotely or from anywhere in the city. If you would like to contact me regarding work or just to say hello send me an email directly or click the hire me button below.

hero.head: Shelter Get Involved: We Are Suburb
hero.copy: The website had started to feel a bit unloved and the team at Shelter decided it was time to add a new lick of paint. Collaborating alongside a user experience team I was responsible for spearheading the visual redesign in line with Shelter’s KPI’s.</br></br>Competition analysis helped reveal the look that Shelter was aiming to achieve and after an iterative design process the visual aesthetic was realised. Utilising a flat user interface helped to declutter the Get Involved section of the Shelter UK site and was complimented by the recommended CSS animations built by the development team.</br></br>This project was designed whilst at Suburb.

hero.head: Design & Branding
hero.copy: Digital Design and branding projects undertaken for a variety of brands, often in close collaboration with development teams. Knowledge of front end languages; HTML, CSS, LESS, JAVASCRIPT AND JQUERY has been the key to delivering high quality designs, files and finished products.

hero.head: Online Advertising
hero.copy: I have extensive experience story boarding and developing banner projects for advertising platforms; Google double click, media mind and flash talking. My work takes a code heavy approach and I have developed a platform for rapid creation of standard banners in any number of sizes. I have worked for a number of national and International brands including; Cadbury, lloyds, Danone and Sony.

hero.head: Iconography
hero.copy: Experience illustrating has helped me gain a reputation for developing pixel perfect Iconography for many clients. This has often been to compliment a specific design approach and has meant close collaboration as part of a design team. I have also directed the creation of iconography as lead designer.

hero.head: user experience
hero.copy: As part of a small user experience team at a boutique agency I have had the chance to get my hands dirty on both client and internal user experience projects. This has enabled me to get involved in the preliminary planning and strategy stages of projects, lead projects and also work as part of a group. Typical tasks have included stakeholder interviews, task analysis, userbility testing, personas, scenario planning, user journeys, wire framing and prototyping.

hero.head: 2d illustration
hero.copy: Illustration has always been a passion. I am inspired by graphic novels and animation from my childhood.  I am looking to expand experience in this area over the coming months so expect this section to grow significantly.

hero.head: 3d illustration
hero.copy: In my final year of university I made the bold move to change my specialism to 3D animation, fortunately that decision has been paying off recently. I have Art directed and created projects for international brands on a number of web based games and flat graphics.
